Room.Name: Stone Stairway
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the top of a stone stairway, which has an awful odor.
Room.LongDescription: Old graffiti has been scratched into the stones, untouched now for several hundred years. Everywhere you have been in this ancient stone ediface has been covered in soot and ashes, but the steps here look to be frequently used. It's impossible to see very far in either direction, as the steps twist in a tight pattern going down.
